title: Anavolver
text: Kicker  and/or  (You may pay an additional  and/or  as you cast this spell.)If Anavolver was kicked with its  kicker, it enters the battlefield with two +1/+1 counters on it and with flying.If Anavolver was kicked with its  kicker, it enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it and with "Pay 3 life: Regenerate Anavolver."
